TITLE: Episode 101 - Radicals vs. Extremists w/ Shane Hazel
DESCRIPTION: Jessie and Maddie sit down with Shane Hazel to talk about his military experience and what led him to question everything he once believed. They also talk about the state of the world today and how the two party system is an abject failure. What are the solutions?
CONTENT: Jessie and Maddie sit down with [Shane Hazel](https://www.radicalpod.com) to talk about his military experience and what led him to question everything he once believed. They also talk about the state of the world today and how the two party system is an abject failure. What are the solutions?
